r.d: This extension provides an IBM database driver for PDO. This driver supports IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, and Apache Derby databases.
r.n: New feature: quote function supported New feature: set_attribute feature supported Fix for internal defect: bindParam crash Fixed Pecl defect 10398: statement->execute is not throw exception Fixed config.w32 regarding compile issue on Windows Fix for internal defect: exec function not returning success/failure when no rows need be returned Fix for internal defect: fix for segfault when using bad SQL
